title: League Client Links unclickable
body:
**Dear rito, or league player.**

As of patch 7.23 all links ( sent in chat or riot links on homepage) are unclickable. I can play games but I can't use any links like the new /dev: upcoming party changes link.

Is there a simple fix for this or do I have to reinstall league. 

pls help.{{champion:32}} 

thanks in advance

replies.body: I'd try running a quick repair as something might have borked out within your client files, but do make sure you also go through the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network is able to load those links as well.
